DOC.brief_summary: The objective proposal evaluate whether wean incubator crib lower versus high weight , 1600g 1800g result short length hospital stay among moderately preterm infant . The hypothesis study length hospital stay ( birth discharge ) decrease among moderate preterm infant wean incubator open crib lower versus high weight , 1600g vs. 1800g .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age 29 0/7 33 6/7 week birth Birth weight le 1600 gram Greater 48 hour age Current weight le 1540 gram In incubator Receiving phototherapy Receiving respiratory support ( include CPAP , ventilation , HFNC > 2 LPM ) Receiving blood pressure support Designated transfer referral hospital incubator Known major congenital chromosomal anomaly
